translations: 引擎中燃料的间歇性燃烧；爆炸声（等于 chuffing）
发出嘎嘎声（chug 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: My crew and I have water-chugging contests.
sentences.translation: 我会和工作人员玩“咕噜水”的比赛。

sentences.sentence: An engine was chugging but not delivering heat.
sentences.translation: 一副引擎砰砰响着却不提供能量。

sentences.sentence: And water chugging competitions can be deadly too.
sentences.translation: 水发出声响的竞赛也是致命的。
